hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SMTP_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Used to connect via smtps when registering for the site defined in WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SMTP_PASSWORD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Used to connect via smtps when registering for the site defined in WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SMTP_FROM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Email to registrants are from this user as defined in WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: AWSREGION=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/placement/availability-zone |sed 's#.$##') DBHOST=$(aws rds describe-db-instances --region $AWSREGION |jq '.DBInstances[] |select(.DBName == "website") | .Endpoint | .Address' |sed 's#"##g') sed -i -e "s#jdbc:mysql://mysql#jdbc:mysql://$DBHOST#" src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties echo registration_from=$SMTP_FROM >> src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties sed -i -e "s#^smtp_username=.*\$#smtp_username=$SMTP_USERNAME#" src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties sed -i -e "s#^smtp_password=.*\$#smtp_password=$SMTP_PASSWORD#" src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/classes/apis.properties
